item.title: 贝莱德的芬克称客户现金创纪录 "只是开始
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）年度客户现金收入达到创纪录的 6,410 亿美元，彰显了该公司在股票和债券、指数基金和主动型基金方面的全球影响力，以及在快速增长且利润丰厚的私人资产市场的影响力。【原文：BlackRock Inc. hauled in an annual record of $641 billion in client cash, underlining the firm’s global reach across stocks and bonds, index and active funds and increasingly the fast-growing — and lucrative — market for private assets.】

item.title: 初创公司融资 2 亿美元让长毛象复活
item.description:
Colossal生物科学公司目前估值102亿美元，其目标是在2028年前生产出猛犸象。【原文：

Colossal Biosciences, now valued at $10.2 billion, aims to produce a mammoth by 2028.

】

item.title: 肖尔茨内阁授权军方射杀不明无人机
item.description: 德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）内阁通过立法，允许德国武装部队击落涉嫌监视军事基地、工业设施和其他重要基础设施的不明无人机。【原文：Chancellor Olaf Scholz’s cabinet passed legislation that will enable Germany’s armed forces to shoot down unidentified drones suspected of spying on military bases, industrial facilities and other critical infrastructure.】

item.title: 南非非法采矿作业造成的死亡人数达到 51 人
item.description: 安全部队表示，在与南非当局长达数月的对峙中死亡的非法矿工人数已增至 51 人。【原文：The number of illegal miners who’ve died in a months-long standoff with the South African authorities increased to 51, the security forces said.】

item.title: 俄罗斯亿万富翁向英国最高法院提出解除制裁的最后请求
item.description: 罗曼-阿布拉莫维奇的一位亿万富翁盟友在英国最高法院最后一次尝试解除英国对他的制裁，认为这些措施的效果是 "破坏了他的声誉"。【原文：A billionaire ally of Roman Abramovich made a final attempt to lift British sanctions against him at the UK’s top court, arguing that the effect of the measures has been to “shatter his reputation.”】

item.title: 荷兰对部分 ASML 芯片工具实施美国出口管制
item.description: 荷兰收紧了出口控制规则，要求 ASML Holding NV 为其部分工具向荷兰政府而非华盛顿申请许可证。【原文：The Netherlands tightened export control rules to make ASML Holding NV apply for licenses with the Dutch government instead of Washington for some of its tools.】

item.title: 移民如何影响美国经济
item.description:
移民真的抢走了美国人的工作吗？更多的移民真的意味着更低的工资吗？以下是关于这个国家最具分歧的问题之一的无厘头指南。【原文：

Do immigrants really take jobs from Americans? And does more immigration really mean lower wages? Here’s a no-nonsense guide to one of the country’s most divisive issues.

】

item.title: 保加利亚为打破政治僵局推进组阁工作
item.description: 保加利亚中右翼政党提议组建联合政府，打破了僵局，为这个巴尔干国家提供了获得有效多数的机会，以解决腐败和采用欧元等问题。【原文：Bulgaria’s center-right party moved to break an impasse as it proposed a coalition government, offering the Balkan nation the chance at a functioning majority to tackle issues such as corruption and euro adoption.】

item.title: 英国石油公司与伊拉克签署重振基尔库克油田的大部分商业条款
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP）和伊拉克政府周二就重启基尔库克油田的大部分商业条款达成一致，朝着有望在今年年初达成最终协议的方向又迈进了一步。【原文：BP and the Iraqi government agreed the majority of commercial terms toward reviving the Kirkuk oil field on Tuesday, further progress toward a final agreement that is expected early this year.】

item.title: 英伟达 3 万亿美元涨势岌岌可危，华尔街却无动于衷
item.description: 自 ChatGPT 助推人工智能狂潮以来的两年时间里，英伟达公司的市值增长了 3 万亿美元，超过了历史上任何股票在如此短时间内的涨幅。但现在，这家芯片制造商的格局正在发生变化。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s $3 trillion run-up in market value in the two years since ChatGPT helped trigger an AI frenzy is bigger than any stock rally in history in such a short time span. But the landscape is now changing for the chipmaker.】

item.title: 彭博民调：瑞典央行分析师对宽松步伐意见不一
item.description: 接受彭博社调查的经济学家对瑞典央行是否会在第一季度降息一到两个季度点的问题意见不一。【原文：Economists surveyed by Bloomberg are divided on whether Sweden’s central bank will deliver one or two quarter-point interest-rate cuts during the first quarter.】

item.title: 安巴尼的 Jio Finance 正在与贷款人洽谈首次债务出售事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由亚洲最富有的商人穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）拥有的影子贷款公司吉奥金融有限公司（Jio Finance Ltd. ）正在与几家贷款机构进行谈判，以首次进军本币债务市场。【原文：Jio Finance Ltd., a shadow lender owned by Asia’s richest businessman Mukesh Ambani, is in talks with several lenders to make its first foray into the local currency debt market, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特斯拉将暂停在华部分新款 Model Y 生产线的升级工作
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，特斯拉公司计划在春节期间暂停在上海生产最近更新的 Model Y 运动型多功能车的部分生产线，为期约三周，以便更好地优化设备。【原文：Tesla Inc. plans to suspend part of the lines manufacturing its recently refreshed Model Y sport utility vehicle in Shanghai for around three weeks over Chinese New Year so it can better optimize equipment, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 法国银行建议将管制储蓄利率降至 2.4
item.description: 法国央行建议五年来首次下调关键的法定储蓄利率，此举可能有助于提高该国贷款机构的收益。【原文：The Bank of France recommended cutting a key regulated savings rate for the first time in five years, a move that could help boost earnings at the country’s lenders.】

item.title: 高盛、摩根大通预测美股因通胀不及预期而震荡
item.description: 华尔街预计，如果周三的美国通胀数据偏离任一方向，股市今天将再遇波折。【原文：Wall Street expects another bumpy day for stocks should Wednesday’s US inflation number miss in either direction.】

item.title: 欧洲央行维勒鲁瓦称夏季前将利率降至 2% 是明智之举
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）说，欧洲中央银行应继续降息，争取在夏季达到 2%的利率水平，因为抗击通胀的斗争实际上已经取得了胜利。【原文：The European Central Bank should continue to cut interest rates to reach 2% by the summer as the battle against inflation is practically won, Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.】

item.title: 战争焦虑笼罩达沃斯专家，乌克兰和平仍遥遥无期
item.description: 尽管即将上任的美国总统唐纳德-特朗普誓言结束乌克兰的敌对状态，但战争仍是世界经济论坛调查的风险专家最担心的问题。【原文：War is the top worry wracking the nerves of risk experts surveyed by the World Economic Forum, despite incoming US President Donald Trump’s vow to end hostilities in Ukraine.】

item.title: 中国建筑商远洋在伦敦寻求债务计划批准
item.description: 违约的中国建筑商远洋集团控股有限公司（Sino-Ocean Group Holding Ltd.）周三将在伦敦一家法院举行为期三天的听证会，希望行使一项法律机制，允许债务人在未经债权人完全批准的情况下完成重组。【原文：Defaulted Chinese builder Sino-Ocean Group Holding Ltd. is entering a London court Wednesday for a three-day hearing, looking to exercise a legal mechanism allowing a debtor to potentially complete restructuring without creditors’ full approval.】

item.title: 印度贸易逆差在创下历史新高后于 12 月份有所缩小
item.description: 印度政府报告称，12 月份的贸易逆差低于预期，而上个月的贸易逆差扩大到创纪录的水平。【原文：The Indian government reported a lower-than-expected trade deficit for December, after the gap widened to a record in the previous month.】

item.title: 大选前德国国内生产总值连续第二年萎缩
item.description: 2024 年，德国经济连续第二年萎缩，2025 年也不太可能有大的增长，这暴露了德国新政府在二月份举行的临时选举中面临的挑战。【原文：Germany’s economy shrank for a second consecutive year in 2024 and is unlikely to grow much in 2025, laying bare the challenge for the country’s new government once snap elections are held in February.】

item.title: 国际能源署称美国禁止的油轮运输了五分之一的俄罗斯海运石油
item.description: 国际能源机构表示，美国最新的制裁措施有可能严重扰乱俄罗斯的能源出口，因为这些制裁措施把运输俄罗斯五分之一以上海运石油的油轮船队列入了黑名单。【原文：The latest US sanctions have the potential to significantly disrupt Russia’s energy exports as they blacklist a tanker fleet that moved more than a fifth of the nation’s seaborne oil flows, the International Energy Agency said.】

item.title: 国际能源署认为今年石油供应过剩风险较小
item.description: 国际能源机构（International Energy Agency）表示，在需求强劲和供应面临新风险的情况下，全球石油市场今年面临的过剩将小于此前的预期。【原文：Global oil markets face a smaller surplus this year than previously expected amid stronger demand and new risks to supply, the International Energy Agency said.】

item.title: 前美林银行家变身 M&A 专家，卷入内幕消息案
item.description: 一名前美林证券（Merrill Lynch）银行家因内幕交易调查而被搜查了位于巴黎郊区讷伊（Neuilly）的住所，但在对搜查是否合法的裁决中败诉。【原文：A ex-Merrill Lynch banker turned in-house deals expert lost a ruling over whether a raid of his home in the Paris suburb of Neuilly in connection with an insider trading probe was legal.】

item.title: 越南力争到 2030 年完成核电站建设
item.description: 越南的目标是在 2030 年之前完成宁顺核电站的建设，因为越南正在加速实现其核能目标，并努力实现电力供应来源的多样化。【原文：Vietnam aims to complete construction of the Ninh Thuan nuclear power plant by 2030 as it ramps up its nuclear energy goals and seeks to diversify sources for power supply.】

item.title: 印度赶在制裁截止前为俄罗斯石油买单
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，印度的国有炼油企业正急于加快俄罗斯原油的付款速度，希望在华盛顿大幅扩大对莫斯科石油业的限制措施下月生效之前完成交易。【原文：India’s state refiners are rushing to speed up payments for Russian crude, hoping to complete their trades before a dramatic expansion of Washington’s curbs on Moscow’s oil industry effectively comes into force next month, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 金多斯称欧洲央行将在经济失去动力的情况下继续放宽政策
item.description: 欧洲央行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，随着该地区经济艰难增长，欧洲央行将继续降低利率。【原文：The European Central Bank will continue lowering interest rates as the region’s economy struggles to grow, according to Vice President Luis de Guindos.】

item.title: 印度为印度央行副行长面试学者和政府顾问
item.description: 印度政府本周开始面试新任央行副行长的候选人，这距离印度储备银行新行长的任命还不到一个月，距离关键的利率决定还有几周时间。【原文：India’s government began interviewing candidates for a new central bank deputy governor this week, less than a month after appointing a new head to the Reserve Bank of India and weeks before a crucial interest rate decision.】

item.title: 卢比下滑导致政策组合受限，促使印度央行放松控制
item.description: 印度储备银行开始放松对卢比的严格控制，承认同时实行固定汇率、开放资本账户和独立货币政策的困难。【原文：The Reserve Bank of India is starting to relent on its tight control of the rupee, acknowledging the difficulty of simultaneously having a fixed exchange rate, open capital account and an independent monetary policy.】
